price: 13. Ustedes (creyentes) causan más temor en sus corazones que Al-lah. Eso es porque son gentes que no entienden.
arabic: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim mina al-lahi dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
